transform_id.description: The id of the transform to stop

deprecated.description: [_data_frame/transforms/] is deprecated, use [_transform/] in the future.

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for the transform to fully stop before returning or not. Default to false

timeout.description: Controls the time to wait until the transform has stopped. Default to 30 seconds

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no transforms. (This includes `_all` string or when no transforms have been specified)
